executionDetails: Removed change.md functionality: removed template copy in workspace-utils.sh init_workspace function, removed change.md from backup files list, removed reference in change-utils.sh next steps, deleted .rdd/templates/change.md template file

Migrated functionality from fix-management.sh to rdd.sh: Verified that mark_prompt_completed and log_prompt_execution functions already exist in prompt-utils.sh and are integrated into rdd.sh. Updated .github/prompts/rdd.06-execute.prompt.md to replace all fix-management.sh calls with rdd.sh prompt commands (mark-completed and log-execution). Updated .rdd-docs/folder-structure.md to remove fix-management.sh reference. Deleted obsolete .rdd/scripts/fix-management.sh file.
